name: 600 Feet Under
description:
600 Feet Under takes the player on a survival journey under the sea. The player needs to find their way out of a cave full of unknown threats, with limited visibility and resources. 

This game was made as part of the Rapid Prototyping Development course at the Centre for Entertainment Arts.

Controls 

Use W to move forward, and S move backwards. 

Use A and D to turn left or right.

Use K to boost to escape enemies.

Use L to Shoot torpedo's  (use your resources wisely) 

Team (United Nations):

Game Programmer / Project Manager: Madhur Arora - LinkedIn

Level Designer: Eduardo Cavalcante Almeida - itch.io / LinkedIn

Game Designer / Narrative Designer: Moncef El Fadili - itch.io / LinkedIn 

2D Artist / Animator: Sida Kong - itch.io / LinkedIn
